metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5290 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A Denial of Service vulnerability exists in ircd-ratbox 3.0.9 in the MONITOR Command Handler. It was discovered that Charybdis incorrectly handled the MONITOR command. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5290` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

charybdis - 3.4.2-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: charybdis package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.2-5').
